TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi CheckedListBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ListBox

summary.span: 显示一个 ，其中在每项的左边显示一个复选框。

span.span: Displays a in which a check box is displayed to the left of each item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此控件提供一个项列表, 用户可以使用键盘或控件右侧的滚动条来导航这些项。This control presents a list of items that the user can navigate by using the keyboard or the scrollbar on the right side of the control. 用户可以通过一个或多个项放置复选标记, 并且可以使用和导航检查项。The user can place a check mark by one or more items and the checked items can be navigated with the and . 若要在运行时向列表中添加对象, 请使用方法分配对象引用数组。To add objects to the list at run time, assign an array of object references with the method. 然后, 列表显示每个对象的默认字符串值。The list then displays the default string value for each object. 可以通过方法向列表中添加单个项。You can add individual items to the list with the method. 对象通过枚举支持三种状态:、和。 The object supports three states through the enumeration: , , and . 由于的 用户界面不提供执行此操作的机制, 因此必须在代码中设置的状态。You must set the state of in the code because the user interface for a does not provide a mechanism to do so. 如果为`true` ,将在项的文本中识别和展开制表符, 从而创建列。If is `true`, the will recognize and expand tab characters in an item's text, creating columns. 这些制表位是预设的, 无法更改。These tab stops are preset and cannot be changed. 若要使用自定义制表位 , 请将设置`true`为`false`, 将设置为, 并将自定义值添加到集合。To use custom tab stops, set to `false`, set to `true`, and add the custom values to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性为`false`, 则将忽略属性, 并将其替换为标准制表符偏移量。 If the property is `false`, the property will be ignored and replaced with standard tab offsets. 类支持以下三个索引集合:The class supports the following three indexed collections: |集合Collection|封装类Encapsulating Class| |----------------|-------------------------| |控件中包含的所有项。All items contained in the control.|| |选中的项 (包括处于不确定状态的项), 这是控件中包含的项的子集。Checked items (including items in an indeterminate state), which is a subset of the items contained in the control.|| |选中的索引, 它是项集合中索引的子集。Checked indexes, which is a subset of the indexes into the items collection. 这些索引指定处于选中状态或不确定状态的项。These indexes specify items in a checked or indeterminate state.|| 以下三个表是类支持的三个索引集合的示例。The following three tables are examples of the three indexed collections that the class supports. 第一个表提供了控件中项的索引集合的示例 (控件中包含的所有项)。The first table provides an example of the indexed collection of items in the control (all items contained in the control). |索引Index|项Item|检查状态Check State| |-----------|----------|-----------------| |00|对象1Object 1|| |11|对象2Object 2|| |22|对象3Object 3|| |33|对象4Object 4|| |44|对象5Object 5|| 第二个表提供已选中项的索引集合的示例。The second table provides an example of the indexed collection of the checked items. |索引Index|项Item| |-----------|----------| |00|对象2Object 2| |11|对象4Object 4| |22|对象5Object 5| 第三个表提供已选中项索引的索引集合的示例。The third table provides an example of the indexed collection of indexes of checked items. |索引Index|项的索引Index of Item| |-----------|-------------------| |00|11| |11|33| |22|44| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用的方法、属性和集合。The following example illustrates how you can use the methods, properties, and collections of a . 这是一个完整的示例, 可在将其复制到项目后运行。This is a complete sample ready to run once you have copied it to your project. 您可以选中和取消选中项, 使用文本框添加项, 单击 "保存" 按钮后, 清除选中项。You can check and uncheck items, use the text box to add items and once you have clicked the save button, clear the checked items. [!code-cpp[Classic CheckedListBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckedListBox Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CheckedListBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckedListBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CheckedListBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckedListBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下 , 使用和`ResizeRedraw`的值来指定在调整大小时重绘控件。By default, uses and the `ResizeRedraw` value of to specify that the control is redrawn when resized.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CheckedIndices As CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection

summary.span: 该 中选中索引的集合。

span.span: Collection of checked indexes in this .
The collection for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 选中索引的集合是控件中所有项的集合中的索引的子集。The collection of checked indexes is a subset of the indexes into the collection of all items in the control. 这些索引指定处于选中状态或不确定状态的项。These indexes specify items in a checked or indeterminate state. ## Examples 下面的示例对中的选中项进行枚举, 以查看项所在的检查状态。The following example enumerates the checked items in the to see what check state an item is in. 该示例演示如何使用属性获取, 并使用属性来获取。The example demonstrates using the property to get the , and the property to get the . 如果给定项的索引 , 则第一个循环使用方法获取每个选中项的。The first loop uses the method to get the of each checked item, given the index of the item. 第二个循环也使用, 但使用方法检索项的索引。The second loop also uses , but uses the method to retrieve the index for the item. [!code-cpp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CheckedItems As CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection

summary.span: 该 中选中项的集合。

span.span: Collection of checked items in this .
The collection for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合是集合中对象的子集, 仅表示其为`Checked`或`Indeterminate`的项。The collection is a subset of the objects in the collection, representing only those items whose is `Checked` or `Indeterminate`. 此集合中的索引按升序排序。The indexes in this collection are in ascending order. ## Examples 下面的示例对中的选中项进行枚举, 以查看项所在的检查状态。The following example enumerates the checked items in the to see what check state an item is in. 该示例演示如何使用属性获取, 并使用属性来获取。The example demonstrates using the property to get the , and the property to get the . 如果给定项的索引 , 则第一个循环使用方法获取每个选中项的。The first loop uses the method to get the of each checked item, given the index of the item. 第二个循环也使用, 但使用方法检索项的索引。The second loop also uses , but uses the method to retrieve the index for the item. 若要运行此示例, 请执行以下步骤:To run this example, perform the following steps: 1. 创建新的 Windows 窗体应用程序。Create a new Windows Forms application. 2. 向窗体添加 和 。Add a and a to the form. 3. 命名该按钮`WhatIsChecked`, 为其事件添加处理程序, 然后从以下处理程序的正文中复制代码。Name the button `WhatIsChecked`, add a handler for its event, and copy in the code from the body of the following handler. 4. 向添加一些项。Add some items to the . 5. 运行该示例并检查列表框中的一些复选框。Run the example and check some of the check boxes in the list box. 6. 单击按钮。Click the button. 您将看到一系列指示已选中哪些项的消息框。You will see a series of message boxes that indicate which items were checked. [!code-cpp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当选定项时是否应切换复选框。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the check box should be toggled when an item is selected.

value.span: 如果立即应用选中标记，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the check mark is applied immediately; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示每次选择项时是否应切换复选框。 indicates whether the check box should be toggled whenever an item is selected. 默认行为是在第一次单击时更改选择, 然后让用户再次单击以应用复选标记。The default behavior is to change the selection on the first click, and then have the user click again to apply the check mark. 但是, 在某些情况下, 您可能更倾向于在单击后立即检查项。In some instances, however, you might prefer have the item checked as soon as it is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过 设置、 和属性来初始化控件。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control by setting the , , and properties. 该示例用控件填充, 并将设置为控件的属性。The example populates the with controls and sets the to the property of the control. 若要运行该示例, 请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为`CheckedListBox1`的的窗`InitializeCheckListBox`体中, 并从窗体的构造函数或 Load 方法中调用方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a named `CheckedListBox1` and call the `InitializeCheckListBox` method from the form's constructor or Load method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Click As EventHandler

summary.span: 当用户单击 控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件将传递给其事件处理程序, 因此它只指示已发生单击。The event passes an to its event handler, so it only indicates that a click has occurred. 如果需要更具体的鼠标信息 (如按钮、单击次数、滚轮旋转或位置), 请使用和 事件, 这些事件将传递到事件处理程序。If you need more specific mouse information (such as the button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the and events, which pass a to the event handler. 双击由用户操作系统的鼠标设置确定。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 用户可以调整双击鼠标按钮时可通过单击的时间量。The user can adjust the amount of time that can pass between clicks during a double-click of a mouse button. 每次用户双击控件时都会引发该事件。The event is raised every time the user double-clicks a control. 例如, 如果您具有窗体的和事件的事件处理方法, 则在双击窗体时会引发事件, 同时调用两种事件处理方法。For example, if you have event-handling methods for the and events of a form, the events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both event-handling methods are called. 如果用户双击不支持事件的控件, 则可能会引发此事件两次。If the user double-clicks a control that does not support the event, the event might be raised twice. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中, 事件处理程序报告事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件, 并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件, 请考虑将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码, 请将其粘贴到包含名为 `CheckedListBox1`的类型的实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `CheckedListBox1`. 然后, 确保事件处理程序与事件相关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#157](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#157)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#157](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#157)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不显式调用 方法，则在引用 属性时将会调用此方法。If you do not explicitly call the method, it will be called when the property is referenced. > [!NOTE] > 若要获取或设置属性, 必须添加对与 .NET Framework 一起安装`Accessibility`的程序集的引用。To get or set the property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写时, 不应调用基类的方法。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, you should not call the base class's method.

summary.span: 获取创建控件句柄时所需要的创建参数。

span.span: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
A that contains the required parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应重写并使用属性来调整派生控件的属性。The property should not be overridden and used to adjust the properties of your derived control. 属性( 例如、和) 应由控件中的相应属性设置, 例如、和。 Properties such as the , , and should be set by the corresponding properties in your control such as , and . 只应在包装标准 Windows 控件类或设置 Windows 窗体命名空间未提供的样式时进行扩展。The should only be extended when you are wrapping a standard Windows control class or to set styles not provided by the Windows Forms namespace. 有关创建控件参数的详细信息, 请参阅`CreateWindow`上`CreateWindowEx` http://msdn.microsoft.com/libraryMSDN library 中`CREATESTRUCT`的 Windows 平台 SDK 参考中的和函数和结构文档。For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将扩展 派生类的属性。The following code example extends the property of a derived class. 属性已更改, 这会导致按钮显示而不是。 The property is changed, which causes the button to display an rather than an . 此示例要求具有从类继承的类。This example requires that you have a class that inherits from the class. [!code-cpp[CreateParams#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/CPP/createparams.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[CreateParams#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/CS/createparams.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CreateParams#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/VB/createparams.vb#3)]

para.span: 否则, 必须提供所有实现。

span.span: Otherwise, you must provide all the implementation.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串指定要显示其内容的列表框中所含对象的属性。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that specifies a property of the objects contained in the list box whose contents you want to display.

value.span: 指定列表框中所含对象的属性名的字符串。

span.span: A string that specifies the name of a property of the objects contained in the list box.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下 , 将显示它包含的项的默认字符串。By default the displays the default string for the items it contains. 但是, 可以显示不同类型的对象, 你可能希望通过指定属性来更改显示的字符串。However, the can display diverse types of objects and you may want to change the displayed string by specifying the property. 如果指定的属性不存在, 或者属性的值为空字符串 (""), 则改为显示该对象的方法的结果。If the specified property does not exist, or the value of the property is an empty string (""), the results of the object's method are displayed instead. 如果无法设置的新值, 则保留以前的值。If the new value of the cannot be set, the previous value is maintained. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过 设置、 和属性来初始化控件。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control by setting the , , and properties. 该示例用控件填充, 并将设置为控件的属性。The example populates the with controls and sets the to the property of the control. 若要运行该示例, 请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为`CheckedListBox1`的的窗`InitializeCheckListBox`体中, 并从窗体的构造函数或 Load 方法中调用方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a named `CheckedListBox1` and call the `InitializeCheckListBox` method from the form's constructor or Load method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件由所有者描述的使用。This event is used by an owner-drawn . 仅当属性设置为或时, 才引发事件。The event is raised only when the property is set to or . 可以使用此事件执行在中绘制项所需的任务。You can use this event to perform the tasks needed to draw items in the . 如果有一个可变大小的项 ( 即设置为), 则在绘制该项之前会引发该事件。If you have a variable-sized item (that is, is set to ), the event is raised before the item is drawn. 可以为事件创建事件处理程序, 以指定要在事件的事件处理程序中绘制的项的大小。You can create an event handler for the event to specify the size for the item that you are going to draw in your event handler for the event. 此事件与此类无关。This event is not relevant to this class.

span.span: Returns a value indicating the check state of the current item.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了在给定索引的情况下获取项的值的功能。 The method provides the ability to get the value of an item, given the index. 如果从不将项的检查状态设置为`Indeterminate`, 则使用方法。If you never set the check state of an item to `Indeterminate`, then use the method. ## Examples 下面的示例对中的选中项进行枚举, 以查看项所在的检查状态。The following example enumerates the checked items in the to see what check state an item is in. 该示例演示如何使用方法设置项的复选状态。The example demonstrates using the method to set the check state of an item. 该示例还演示了如何使用属性来获取和属性以获取。The example also demonstrates using the property to get the and the property to get the . 如果给定项的索引 , 则第一个循环使用方法获取每个选中项的。The first loop uses the method to get the of each checked item, given the index of the item. 第二个循环也使用, 但使用方法检索项的索引。The second loop also uses , but uses the method to retrieve the index for the item. [!code-cpp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ItemCheck As ItemCheckEventHandler

summary.span: 当某项的选中状态更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the checked state of an item changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在事件发生之后, 检查状态才会更新。The check state is not updated until after the event occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中, 事件处理程序报告事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件, 并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件, 请考虑将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码, 请将其粘贴到包含名为 `CheckedListBox1`的类型的实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `CheckedListBox1`. 然后, 确保事件处理程序与事件相关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#156](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#156)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#156](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#156)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此度量基于字体高度加上一个小边距, 以提供项周围的空白区域。This measurement is based on the font height plus a small margin to provide white space around the item. 当字体更改为9.75 点时, "g" 和 "y" 等字符的扩展插件不会正确显示。The extenders of characters such as "g" and "y" do not display properly when the font is changed to 9.75-point Arial. 若要更正此错误, 请从派生一个类, `base.ItemHeight+2`然后重写以返回。To correct this, derive a class from and override to return `base.ItemHeight+2`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可以获取对控件中当前存储的项列表的引用。The property enables you to obtain a reference to the list of items that are currently stored in a control. 通过此引用, 你可以添加项、移除项以及获取集合中项的计数。With this reference, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of the items in the collection. 有关可通过项集合执行的任务的详细信息, 请参阅类参考主题。For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the item collection, see the class reference topics. ## Examples 下面的示例对中的选中项进行枚举, 以查看项所在的检查状态。The following example enumerates the checked items in the to see what check state an item is in. 该示例使用属性获取以使用方法检索项的索引。The example uses the property to get the to retrieve the index of an item using the method. 该示例还演示了如何使用属性来获取, 并使用属性来获取。The example also demonstrates using the property to get the , and the property to get the . 如果给定项的索引 , 则第一个循环使用方法获取每个选中项的。The first loop uses the method to get the of each checked item, given the index of the item. 第二个循环也使用, 但使用方法检索项的索引。The second loop also uses , but uses the method to retrieve the index for the item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以为此事件创建事件处理程序, 以便在事件中绘制项之前指定项的大小。You can create an event handler for this event to specify the size of an item before it is drawn in the event. 仅当属性设置为时, 才引发事件。The event is raised only when the property is set to . 项的最大高度为255像素。The maximum height of a item is 255 pixels. 此事件与此类无关。This event is not relevant to this class.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法选择或清除单击的项的复选框。The method selects or clears the check box of the item that is clicked. `true`如果将属性设置为, 则在第一次单击该项时, 此复选框将从 "已选择" 或 "已清除" 状态切换。If the property is set to `true`, the check box is switched from a selected or cleared state the first time the item is clicked. 否则, 只有在已选择项时, 才会切换复选框。Otherwise, the check box is switched only if the item is already selected. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写时, 请确保调用基类的方法, 以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 获取或设置指定选择模式的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying the selection mode.
Either the or value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否可以选择列表框中的某个项或不选择任何项。The property determines whether one item in the list box can be selected or no items can be selected. 对于对象, 不支持多个选择。For objects, multiple selection is not supported. 您可以将模式设置为一个项或没有项。You can set the mode to one item or no items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过 将设置为以允许选择列表中的一个项来初始化控件。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control by setting the to allow one item in the list to be selected. 若要运行该示例, 请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为`CheckedListBox1`的的窗`InitializeCheckListBox`体中, 并从窗体的构造函数或 Load 方法中调用方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a named `CheckedListBox1` and call the `InitializeCheckListBox` method from the form's constructor or Load method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传递的`true`值时, 此方法将值设置为`Checked`。When a value of `true` is passed, this method sets the value to `Checked`. 的`false`值设置为。 `Unchecked`A value of `false` sets to `Unchecked`. ## Examples 下面的示例对中的项进行枚举, 并检查列表中的所有其他项。The following example enumerates the items in the and checks every other item in the list. 该示例演示如何使用和方法来设置项的复选状态。The example demonstrates using the and methods to set the check state of an item. 对于要检查的每个其他项, 将调用以将设置为`Indeterminate`, 而在另一项上调用以将选中状态设置为`Checked`。For every other item that is to be checked, is called to set the to `Indeterminate`, while is called on the other item to set the checked state to `Checked`. 该示例还演示了如何使用属性获取以获取项的。The example also demonstrates using the property to get the to get the of items. [!code-cpp[CheckedListBox#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[CheckedListBox#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CheckedListBox#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/VB/source.vb#3)]

summary.span: 设置指定索引处项的复选状态。

span.span: Sets the check state of the item at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法引发 事件。The method raises the event. 项, 其设置为`Indeterminate`在复选框中显示复选标记, 但是该框灰显以指示选中项的不确定状态。Items whose is set to `Indeterminate` appear with a check mark in the check box, but the box is grayed to indicate the indeterminate status of the checked item. ## Examples 下面的示例对中的项进行枚举, 并检查列表中的所有其他项。The following example enumerates the items in the and checks every other item in the list. 该示例演示如何使用和方法来设置项的复选状态。The example demonstrates using the and methods to set the check state of an item. 对于要检查的每个其他项, 将调用以将设置为`Indeterminate`, 而在另一项上调用以将选中状态设置为`Checked`。For every other item that is to be checked, is called to set the to `Indeterminate`, while is called on the other item to set the checked state to `Checked`. 该示例还演示了如何使用属性获取以获取项的。The example also demonstrates using the property to get the to get the of items. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过 设置、 和属性来初始化控件。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control by setting the , , and properties. 该示例用控件填充, 并将设置为控件的属性。The example populates the with controls and sets the to the property of the control. 若要运行该示例, 请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为`CheckedListBox1`的的窗`InitializeCheckListBox`体中, 并从窗体的构造函数或 Load 方法中调用方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a named `CheckedListBox1` and call the `InitializeCheckListBox` method from the form's constructor or Load method. member this.UseCompatibleTextRendering : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是使用 类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) 还是 类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) 呈现文本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.

value.span: 如果类应用于执行文本呈现, 以便与版本1.0 和1.1 兼容, 则为。

span.span: if the class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
of the .NET Framework; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性旨在提供使用[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] 类[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]呈现文本的 Windows 窗体控件与使用执行自定义文本呈现的应用程序之间的视觉兼容性`UseCompatibleTextRendering` 类。The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the class. 在大多数情况下, 如果你的应用程序未从[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]升级, 则建议你`UseCompatibleTextRendering`将设置为的默认值`false`。In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`. 中引入了[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]基于的类, 以便提高性能, 使文本更好地显示, 并改善对国际字体的支持。 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts. 在的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]早期版本中, 使用了基于的[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]类来执行所有文本呈现。In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based class was used to perform all text rendering. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]以不同于的[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]方式计算字符间距和自动换行。calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]. 在使用类呈现文本的 Windows 窗体应用程序中, 这可能会导致使用的控件的文本与应用程序中的其他文本显示不相同。In a Windows Forms application that uses the class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use to appear different from the other text in the application. 若要解决这种不兼容性问题`UseCompatibleTextRendering` , 可以`true`将特定控件的属性设置为。To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control. 若要`UseCompatibleTextRendering` `true`为应用程序中的所有受支持的控件设置 , 请使用参数`true`调用方法。To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the method with a parameter of `true`.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以处理结构中标识的操作系统消息。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the structure. 在此示例中处理 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 操作系统消息, 以了解其他应用程序何时变为活动状态。The WM_ACTIVATEAPP operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. http://msdn.microsoft.com/library请参阅 MSDN library 中的平台 SDK 文档参考, 了解可用的、 和值。Refer to the Platform SDK documentation reference located in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library to understand the available , , and values. 可在平台 SDK (核心 SDK 部分) 下载中包含的 Windows .h 标头文件中找到实际常数值, 该文件也可在上http://msdn.microsoft.com/library的 MSDN library 中找到。Actual constant values can be found in the Windows.h header file included in the Platform SDK (Core SDK section) download, which is also available in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/VB/form1.vb#1)]
